name: Piña Colada
description: An irresistible tiki classic, and an occasion to pull out the paper umbrellas. Just beware of brain freeze.
keywords: cream of coconut, pineapple juice, rum, summer
recipeIngredient: 4 ounces Coco Lopez cream of coconut

recipeInstructions.text: Add rum, pineapple juice, cream of coconut and ice to blender. Blend until smooth and frosty; add more ice as necessary. Pour into tall glasses and garnish with pineapple slices and maraschino cherries (and paper umbrellas, if you have them).

video.name: Piña Colada
video.description: How to make a piña colada, the irresistible tiki classic.
